NPC外貌特征: 这个NPC满脸都是严重的痤疮。 This NPC has bad acne all over their face.
这位NPC眯着眼睛，仿佛正盯着刺眼的光线。 This NPC has their eyes squinted like they are looking into a bright light.
每次该NPC在故事中出现时，身上都会多一处纹身。认识他的其他NPC对此从未提及。 The NPC has one more tattoo every time they show up in the story. This is never addressed by any other NPC who could know him.
这位NPC拥有一头乌黑亮丽的长发，长度超过自身身高，编成一条长辫。他们自出生以来从未剪过头发。 This NPC has luscious, carbon-black, long hair that extents beyond their own height. It is keep in a long braid. They haven’t cut it since birth.
这个NPC长着一张只有母亲才会喜欢的脸。 This NPC has a face only a mother could love.
这位NPC的身材既显得肌肉发达又略显瘦长。 This NPC has a body build that appears both muscular and lanky.
这位NPC身材纤细，体格柔弱。 This NPC has a thin, delicate build.
这个NPC缺少一颗或多颗牙齿。 This NPC is missing one or more teeth.
这个NPC有着浓密的大眉毛。 This NPC has large bushy eyebrows.
这名NPC有一处独特的军队纹身。 This NPC has a distinctive military tattoo.
这个NPC的手指略长，或许他们体内流淌着一丝精灵的血脉？ This NPC has fingers that are just a little too long. Maybe they have a bit of fae blood in them?
这个NPC手臂上的皮肤看起来像是从严重的化学烧伤中恢复过来。 The skin on the arms of this NPC seems like it's recovering from a nasty chemical burn.
这位NPC的皮肤上布满了战斗留下的疤痕。 This NPC's skin is covered in battle scars.
这个NPC双手灵巧。 This NPC is ampidextrous.

这位NPC外表邋遢且不修边幅。 This NPC has an unkempt and slobbish look.
这位NPC的手异常冰冷。 This NPC has incredibly cold hands.

这个NPC有驼背。 This NPC has a hunchback.
这个NPC的嗓音带有嘶嘶声。 This NPC has a hissing voice.
这位NPC的眼睛总是水汪汪的。 This NPC has watery eyes.

这位NPC有一个独特的邪教纹身。 This NPC has a distinctive cult tattoo.
这个NPC拥有尖细刺耳的嗓音。 This NPC has a high-pitched, squeaky voice.
这位NPC的下巴上有一道明显的疤痕。 This NPC has a large scar across their chin.
该NPC有几根手指/手/臂被机械装置替代。 The NPC has a mechanical replacement for a few fingers/hand/arm.
这位NPC拥有一双迷人的眼睛。 This NPC has gorgeous eyes.
这位NPC总是穿着最精致的服装。 This NPC is always wearing only the finest clothing.

这个NPC有一块因旧伤而变色的皮肤。很久以前，他们被（某人、某物）下毒。虽然康复了，但留下了痕迹。 This NPC has a patch of discolored skin around an old scar. They were poisoned by (someone, something) long ago. They recovered, but it left its mark.
这个NPC手上总有些红色污渍。肯定只是番茄酱……对吧？ This NPC always has some red stain on their hands. Surely its just tomato sauce... right?
这位NPC身上总是散发着农场动物的气味。 This NPC always smells like farm animals.
这个NPC有一条木制假腿。 This NPC has a peg leg.
这位NPC每只手有六根手指而非五根。 This NPC has 6 fingers instead of 5 on each hand.
这位NPC美得惊人，人们走过时常会忍不住回头多看两眼。 This NPC is INCREDIBLY beautiful. People often do double-takes of them as they walk by.
这位NPC拥有深沉的低音嗓音。 This NPC has a deep, baritone voice.
这位NPC散发着极其难闻的气味。 This NPC smells TERRIBLE.
这个NPC留着蜂窝状的发型。 This NPS has a beehive hair style.
该NPC的头发因一次涉及狂野魔法的事故而能随情绪变化颜色。 The NPC has hair changing color according to their mood following an accident involving wild magic.
这位NPC穿着邋遢，常常连续几周都穿着同一套衣服。 This NPC dresses like a slob, and tends to wear the same clothes for weeks.
该NPC因一次农场事故失去了1d8根手指。 This NPC is missing 1d8 fingers from a farming accident.
这位NPC在一次厨房事故中失去了一根手指。 This NPC is missing a finger in a kitchen accident.

这位NPC穿着破旧肮脏的衣服。 This NPC wears torn, dirty clothing.
这位NPC留着和尚般的发型。 This NPS has a monk haircut.
这位NPC从不直视任何人的眼睛。 This NPC never looks anyone in the eyes.
这位NPC拥有极为突出的颧骨和凹陷的双颊。 This NPC has really accentuated cheekbones, and hollow cheeks.
这位NPC脸上有许多雀斑。 This NPC has lots of freckles.
这个NPC的牙齿明显不齐，说话时总是试图遮住嘴巴。 This NPC has noticeably crooked teeth. They try to hide their mouth while speaking.

这位NPC拥有快乐而温暖的眼神。 This NPC has happy, warm eyes.
这位NPC是秃头（天生秃头或剃光头）。 This NPC is bald (naturally bald, shaved head).

这位NPC梳着武士发髻。 This NPS has a samurai bun hair style.

这个NPC有一种会导致他们频繁打喷嚏的过敏症。 This NPC has an allergy that causes them to sneeze a lot.
NPC总是驼着背。如果他们挺直身子，身高能增加一英尺。 The NPC is constantly hunched over. If they stretched upwards, they'd gain a good foot in height.
这位NPC有着浓密、毛茸茸的连心眉。 This NPC is has a thick, furry unibrow.
这位NPC的手臂上有一个美人鱼纹身。 This NPC has a tattoo of a mermaid on their arm.

这位NPC容易发生意外，常在鹅卵石上绊倒，把饮料和食物洒在自己和他人身上，从楼梯上摔下，但从未造成致命伤害。 This NPC is accident prone, keeps tripping on cobblestones, spill drinks and food on themselves and others, falls down stairs, but never any fatal injuries.
这位NPC身上总是散发着熏香的气味。 This NPC always smells like incense.

这位NPC在镜子前花费的时间比睡觉还多。他们的脸上没有一丝瑕疵或可见皱纹，连笑纹或皱眉纹都找不到。每一根头发都精心打理，形成飘逸的发丝。 This NPC must spend more time in front of a mirror than they do sleeping. There is not a single flaw or visible wrinkle on their face, not a smile or frown line to be had. Every single hair is immaculately placed into flowing locks of hair.
这位NPC的眼神显得遥远而深邃。 This NPC has distant eyes.

这位NPC面容憔悴疲惫，脸上布满三天未刮的粗糙胡茬。一侧脸颊上几乎艺术般地涂抹着几道污渍。 This NPC had a worn, tired face. Three days of rough stubble covered their face. There were smears of dirt spread almost artfully across one side of their face.
